sentences.en: " It is very necessary that everyone shall be envious?
sentences.cn: " 有必要让大家这样羡慕咱们 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do I sound envious? I pity them, actually.
sentences.cn: 我听起来是嫉妒吗？实际上我是可怜他们。

sentences.en: Do not be envious of your neighbors.
Envious glances were cast at Anne.
sentences.cn: 嫉妒的目光向安妮投来.

sentences.en: Everyone is so envious of her.
He was envious of everyone else's success.
sentences.cn: 看到任何人的成功他都妒火中烧.

sentences.en: I am not envious of your success.
I don't think I'm envious of your success.
sentences.cn: 我想我并不嫉妒你的成功。

sentences.en: It is the appalled, envious laughter of knowledge at innocence.
sentences.cn: 这种笑令人吃惊, 是有知对无知嫉妒的笑.

sentences.en: She is envious of Jane's good looks and covetous of her car.
sentences.cn: 她既忌妒简的美貌又垂涎她的汽车.

sentences.en: She was envious of her sister's new fashionable dress.
sentences.cn: 她很羡慕姐姐的那件时髦的新衣服.

sentences.en: Small - minded men are envious, for everything seems great to them.
sentences.cn: 心胸狭窄的人是会忌妒的, 因为一切东西对他们来说都过于伟大了.

sentences.en: They passed the young Irishman, who looked after them with envious eyes.
sentences.cn: 他们走过那个年轻的爱尔兰人, 他用妒忌的目光看着他们的背影.

sentences.en: Tom was envious of his brother's success in business.
sentences.cn: 汤姆羡慕(或妒忌)他哥哥事业上的成功.

words.tran_cn: 值得羡慕的；引起忌妒的

trans.tran_en: wanting something that someone else has
